I know this is going to happen sooner or later, but Thomas's recent 
questi=
on brought it to mind.  It will be really interesting someday to 
be able t=
o set up substrates with a GUI, so you can intuitively specify 
how inputs/=
outputs/hidden nodes are configured and run a range of 
experiments quickly=
.  There are many ways that such an app could be set 
up but however it wor=
ks it would certainly be fun to play with in 
conjunction with a HyperNEAT =
system.

ken
